headline: Here’s Why Morgan Stanley Maintained a Hold Rating on Applied Materials (AMAT)
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the 12 Best Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Long Term. On June 16, Shane Brett CFA from Morgan Stanley maintained a Hold rating on Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) with a price target of $158. The cautious rating is based on a mixed outlook on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing […]
